name: emojule
title: Emojule - The Emoji Module
description: Adds emoji/emoticon/smiley support to chat and most editor based textareas, using Twemojis. To get suggestions just start by writing a ':' in chat and suggestions should appear! The emojis are encoded similar to most modern apps, like Discord, using ':keyword:', e.g. ':smile:'.
author: Moerill
